https://tmrev.io/movie/250131-Brasslands 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Half a million people descend upon a tiny Serbian village for the 50th anniversary of the world's largest trumpet festival. Brasslands chronicles the cultural and musical collisions through the personal journeys of 3 musicians - American, Serbian, Roma - whose lives are bound to Balkan brass for very different reasons. Brasslands
